long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions works with weaselspark (https://admin.weaselspark.com).
Weaselspark aims to help project to trace bugs faster and easier.
This addons will take better screenshot than the weaselspark javascript library.

This addons will only work with the weaselspark javascript library.
In the future it will possible to use it with no library.
To raise a bug click on the addon icons, or simply do a ctrl+alt+h or click on the weaselspark icon on the page (if present)

V 0.1 : 
- better and faster screenshot

V 0.2 (24/06/2019):
- New icons.
- Extension is not always detected.

V 0.3 (02/07/2019):
- Fix unable to take screenshot with weasel icon or ctrl+alt+h.
